ComicInfo.Summary:
The final cataclysmic issue! In MIMIC, Fleshcook and Julie are against the wall and have one last chance and the merge. Pat Shand teams up with original series artist Gabriel Andrade for a special final chapter of AMERICAN HISTORY X, set during the invasion of Chooga from the first series!
Available with a sizzling array of covers: Regular by Gabriel Andrade, History X Wraparound and American History X by Raulo Caceres, Fatal Fantasy and Hellish Homage by Renato Camilo, and Ms Mayhem by Christian Zanier. Don't miss the three-cover Crossing Over set by Matt Martin, each limited to just 250 copies, nor the Century (of Blood) cover limited to 100 copies also by Camilo.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Gabriel Andrade | 1 | | CoBC | Century of Blood Cover, Limited to 100 | Renato Camilo | 4 | | HHC | Hellish Homage Cover | Renato Camilo | 5 | | MMC | Ms. Mayhem Cover | Christian Zanier | 6 | | FFC | Fatal Fantasy Cover | Renato Camilo | 7 | | AHXC | American History X Cover | Raulo Caceres | 8 | | COCC | Crossing Over Corrupt Cover, Limited to 250 | Matt Martin | 9 | | COBC | Crossing Over Cover, Limited to 250 | Matt Martin | 10 | | COCC | Crossing Over Bloody Cover, Limited to 250 | Matt Martin | 11 | | HXWC | History X Wraparound Cover | Raulo Caceres | 12 | | NWO | New World Order: Fall of Fantasyland Variant Cover C, Limited to 333 | ? | 2 | | NWO | New World Order: Fall of Fantasyland Variant Cover D, Limited to 333 | ? | 3 |
